abstract: Former Gov Bob McDonnell of Virginia files request with United States Supreme Court to allow him to remain free during his final appeal of two-year sentence on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell asked the Supreme Court to allow him to stay out of prison while he makes his final appeal on public corruption convictions.

headline.main: Virginia: Ex-Governor Takes Plea to a Justice
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Ex-Governor Takes Plea to a Justice

snippet: Former Gov. Bob McDonnell asked the Supreme Court to allow him to stay out of prison while he makes his final appeal on public corruption convictions.
